Class d_ArrayListDouble

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      • java.util.AbstractList<E>
        • java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double>
          • reuze.d_ArrayListDouble
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.Double>, java.util.Collection<java.lang.Double>, java.util.List<java.lang.Double>, java.util.RandomAccess

    public class d_ArrayListDouble
extends java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double>
    Extends an ArrayList to simplify network input and output; with this class, we avoid multi-dimensional arrays and simplify creation of network inputs.
    Author:
    Andrew Brown
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
